bilingual.source: She copes with dwarfism by leading an active life.
bilingual.target: 她通过积极的生活方式来应对侏儒症。

bilingual.source: As an active participant, he made many suggestions.
bilingual.target: 作为一个积极的参与者，他提出了很多建议。

bilingual.source: She is a very active freshman and joined many clubs.
bilingual.target: 她是个非常积极的大一新生，参加了很多社团。

bilingual.source: The workshop was a success thanks to the active participants.
bilingual.target: 由于积极的参与者，研讨会取得了成功。

bilingual.source: Being a good conversationist requires active listening skills.
bilingual.target: 成为一个善于交谈的人需要积极的倾听技巧。

bilingual.source: Such active research can have another effect.
bilingual.target: 这种积极的研究可能产生另一种效果。
他过着非常积极的生活。
我会给声音一个积极的意含。

bilingual.source: They now want to be active changers.
bilingual.target: 他们现在想要是积极的改变者.

list.abstract: active（英 [ˈæktɪv]，美 [ˈæktɪv]），英语单词，作形容词用，为积极的；积极参与的；工作的。作名词时，为动词主动态；主动语态。短语搭配有take an active part in（积极参加）。例句为“Be more socially active and aggressive.（在社交上更加活跃和积极）”。 active形容词类近义词有positive、valid、available等，名词类近义词有rustler，相关反义词有passive、voice、inactive等。

yingyinNormal.en: We are in active litigation at this moment, Mr. Chairman...
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们此刻正在进行积极的上诉，主席先生。

yingyinNormal.en: But am I correct in assuming that your husband will be an active vice president?
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是我没猜错的话，你丈夫会是一位行事积极的副总统。

yingyinNormal.en: It's harder to keep an active VP out of the press than in it, but it's possible if we give the media just enough to keep them from starving.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想让媒体不去关注积极的副总统是比较难的。但我们可以让媒体刚好有些料可追，不至于什么都拿不到。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, Baymax, I didn't know you were still active.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，大白，我不知道你还能用。

yingyinNormal.en: In what way? We believe there's an active wiretap.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在哪个方面？我们相信确有电话窃听。

yingyinNormal.en: So since the majority of you are or will become sexually active at some point…
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以，既然你们大部人现在或是总有一天会需求旺盛...

yingyinNormal.en: Exactly. And, in fact, that area has been a region of very active wind development.
yingyinNormal.zh: 事实上，那地方风能发展已经非常活跃。

yingyinNormal.en: It wouldn't be the worst thing if we were more active. Oh. You make an excellent point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们多运动一点也不是什么坏事啊，兄台此言甚是有理。

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't matter. As long as we steer clear of whichever sector is active, we'll be safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 无所谓了，避开活跃中的区域我们就安全。

yingyinNormal.en: How many planes are we looking at? During the peak portion of the day, we're 5,000 to 6,000 flights active.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有多少架飞机？在高峰期有5000到6000架活跃航班。

yingyinNormal.en: And how long have you been active on Scabbit, Mr. Irvin? From the beginning. The very beginning. Hi, Darryl.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你活跃于「瞎掰网」多久了，艾文先生？从一开始从网站建立就开始了，你好，达尔。

yingyinNormal.en: Does our warrant restrict listening to a law firm in active litigation with us for a non-terroristic action?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们是否有权监听一家正起诉我们的律所，尽管不涉及恐怖主义？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, I don't know. I kind of promised myself I'd get off the computer, be more physically active. Get some exercise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我说不准，我答应过自己要远离电脑，多点锻炼身体，多做些运动。

yingyinNormal.en: What are all those lights up on that screen right there? Those are flights. Those are the active flights in the system right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那些屏幕上的光点是什么？是飞机航班。这些是系统中活跃的航线。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a renegade unit. We don't know who they are yet. You're telling me there's an active IRA unit on the loose you know nothing about? Yes, I am.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是个叛逃的分支。虽然现在还不清楚成员到底是谁。你是说有一群活跃的IRA成员已经失去了控制，你们对具体情况一无所知？是的，是这样。

yingyinNormal.en: I read an article in the paper the other day that said that although US teenagers are not the most sexually active, we have the highest rate of teenage pregnancy, okay?
yingyinNormal.zh: 有天，我读到一篇文章上面说，虽然美国青年并不算是最性活跃的，但我们的青少年怀孕率是最高的，知道吗？

exam_freq_info.chinese: 活跃的; 积极的; 主动的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种积极的研究可以产生另一种效果。

examination_example.sentence: But they show comprehension to consist not just of passive assimilation but of <highlight>active</highlight> engagement in inference and problem-solving.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是他们表现出的理解不仅仅包括被动的同化，还包括主动参与推理和解决问题。

word_usage.usage: active作“起作用的”、“主动的”时，无比较级和最高级；作其他意思时，比较级和最高级是more active和most active。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指非常活跃的或积极参与某活动的。
指动作敏捷、充满活力、轻快活泼地从事某项工作或活动。
指精力充沛、奋力从事某事业。
侧重活跃热情, 生机勃勃的, 有生气。

examination_example.sentence: You can make your taste buds <highlight>active</highlight> again by drinking water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以通过喝水让你的味蕾重新活跃起来。

examination_example.sentence: Get physically <highlight>active</highlight>, because exercise is a known brain booster.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要积极锻炼身体，因为运动是众所周知的大脑助推器。

word_usage.usage: active作“起作用的”、“主动的”时，无比较级和最高级；作其他意思时，比较级和最高级是more active和most active。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指非常活跃的或积极参与某活动的。
指动作敏捷、充满活力、轻快活泼地从事某项工作或活动。
指精力充沛、奋力从事某事业。
侧重活跃热情，生机勃勃的，有生气。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

examination_example.sentence: Just a few days after the signs went up, he found people sitting there and engaging in <highlight>active</highlight> and joyful conversations.

examination_example.sentence_trans: 在男性运动前禁食时这些基因比吃过早餐时要活跃得多。

examination_example.sentence: By writing when her mind was most <highlight>active</highlight>.
